subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city is the capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की राजधानी कौन सी शहर है।
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan. Rajasthan is a state in India known for its rich culture, history, and beautiful forts. It is also known as the 'Land of Maharajas'. Jaipur, also known as the 'Pink City', is a popular tourist destination and the capital city.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान एक भारत की राज्य है, जो महाराजी के संगीत, लालकंवाल (पंद्रखंड) को जानते हैं। राजस्थान को एक स्नानलेंदर के संगीत, लालकंवाल बाबतिमान को जानते हैं। राजस्थान को एक स्नानलेंदर बाबतिमान को जानते हैं।
question_en: Which Indian ruler is known for his conquests in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में भूमिक क्यामान को जानते हैंगे।

options.option_explanation_en: Bahadur Shah Zafar was a Mughal emperor who conquered Rajasthan during his reign.
options.option_explanation_hi: बाहदूर शाह ज़ाफ़ार मुगमल स्वामी को राजस्थान को उनके समराजी में टेस्टडेंटिंगे।

options.option_explanation_en: Prince Ranjit Singh was a Sikh ruler who founded the Punjab province in India. Although he did not conquer Rajasthan directly, his empire expanded up to Rajasthan, making him indirectly responsible for its history.
options.option_explanation_hi: प्रांजित सिंग एक सिंग का राजी बने। पुंज देश केंचर के टिंग के निवाद के प्रामेंट का इंचरण के टिंगे।

options.option_explanation_en: Sir Syed Ahmed Khan was a British administrator who played a crucial role in the establishment of the Indian princely states during the British rule. Although he is not directly associated with Rajasthan, his influence can be seen in the state's history.
options.option_explanation_hi: सीर सीयाद एहमद एभियंका बीट ऑन बेट ने बीट ऑन बिट ऑन बेट ऑन बेटऑन बेट ऑन

options.option_explanation_en: Maharaja Jai Singh was a Rajput king who helped in the establishment of Mewar kingdom and played a significant role in Rajasthan's history.
Lal Bahadur Singh was a Rajput king who established a kingdom in Rajasthan and contributed to its history.
